prompt: Develop a compact user role management interface optimized for mobile devices with a light theme. The app bar should display 'User Role Management' in black text with a settings icon. Place a compact search bar below with a square border and placeholder text 'Search'. The main content should be a single-column list of user cards, each with a small circular avatar, user name in bold, email in small gray text, and role badges ('Admin' in red, 'Editor' in blue, 'Viewer' in green) aligned vertically on the right. Include a small 'Edit Role' button with a blue outline at the bottom of each card. Use a white background with minimal padding for a compact layout.
